TABLE.NAME: block_sgelection
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for block_sgelection, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: block_sgelection_office
TABLE.COMMENT: list of possible offices candidates can hold

FIELD.NAME: election_id
FIELD.COMMENT: election Identification - foreign key for election table

FIELD.NAME: year
FIELD.COMMENT: year election is taking place

FIELD.NAME: sem_code
FIELD.COMMENT: semester code for the year

FIELD.NAME: start_date
FIELD.COMMENT: date election begins

FIELD.NAME: end_date
FIELD.COMMENT: date election is over

TABLE.NAME: block_sgelection_votes
TABLE.COMMENT: votes cast for resolutions and candidates

FIELD.NAME: college
FIELD.COMMENT: college that the voter is from

FIELD.NAME: major
FIELD.COMMENT: major that the voter is in

FIELD.NAME: candidate_id
FIELD.COMMENT: foreign key for candidate

FIELD.NAME: year
FIELD.COMMENT: year the voter is in

FIELD.NAME: full_time
FIELD.COMMENT: yes or no if the student is enrolled full time

FIELD.NAME: ip_address
FIELD.COMMENT: IP address where vote was

FIELD.NAME: time
FIELD.COMMENT: time that the vote was cast

TABLE.NAME: block_sgelection_voters
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: userid from user table of the voter

FIELD.NAME: election_id
FIELD.COMMENT: id from election table of the election the voter is participating in

TABLE.NAME: block_sgelection_supp_info
TABLE.COMMENT: extra information that can be attached to ballot

FIELD.NAME: election_id
FIELD.COMMENT: election the supp info belongs in

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: title of the supp info

FIELD.NAME: text
FIELD.COMMENT: what goes in the body of the supp info

FIELD.NAME: office_id
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the office the officer currently holdsi

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: userid from users table of the officer

FIELD.NAME: start_date
FIELD.COMMENT: date the officer started

FIELD.NAME: end_date
FIELD.COMMENT: when the officers term in office ends
